rows.label: tlk70000038_05_msg0001
rows.name:
Popolo thought knew
everything about Boss.

rows.label: tlk70000038_05_msg0003
rows.name: Boss popular with ladies! Who knew?

rows.label: tlk70000038_05_msg0004
rows.name:
Macmac-san really got eye for Boss.
And Boss aware of Macmac too...

rows.label: tlk70000038_05_msg0005
rows.name:
Mo! Always Boss! How come Popolo
never have romantic tale to tell?

rows.label: tlk70000038_05_msg0006
rows.name:
Popolo just not attractive.
Wish Popolo could be showered
with attention sometime...

rows.label: tlk70000038_05_msg0007
rows.name:
Oh... Sorry! Just talking
to self there...

rows.label: tlk70000038_05_msg0008
rows.name:
Oh, yeah! It big mystery, but
Boss losing fur again recently.

rows.label: tlk70000038_05_msg0009
rows.name:
Wonder if this lovesickness
or Nopto-mange?
